title: Musk Drives Tesla Off The Road, The Global Cyberattack Threat, Drugmakers Avoid Opioids
itunes:title: Musk Drives Tesla Off The Road, The Global Cyberattack Threat, Drugmakers Avoid Opioids
description:
Carol is joined by Joel Levington, Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Credit Analyst, and Dana Hull, Bloomberg News Technology Reporter, to discuss Tesla’s stock and credit troubles impacted by Elon Musk telling investors not to buy shares if they can’t stomach volatility. Kathy Boyle, President at Chapin Hill Advisors, provides a technical analysis of the markets. Anurag Rana, Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Software Analyst, explains why cyberattacks are the biggest risk to the global economy. Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Chart of the Day.” Jef Feeley, Bloomberg News Delaware Bureau Chief, says drugmakers are balking at an opioid accord. And we Drive to the Close with Ross Gerber, President & CEO at Gerber Kawasaki. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
